name: Master of War
description:
Made for ludum dare 40

You’re the general with complete control over your army. You slowly drift towards insanity throughout the game with the weight of every murder on your back.

Click and drag to select a group of soldiers and then click where you want them to go.

Guys with guns will shoot enemies within range, guys with grenades will throw a grenade at enemies within range. Grenades can be thrown over barriers.

Complete each level by killing all of the enemies.
